__e: - Who are you? My name is Mason and I'm an attorney.
Madam, bring Mason and see what we can do.
My name is Mason and the officer at the desk told me I could see my dogs.
Mr. Mason is waiting for him.
I suppose miss Mason's here because of her brother.
- Now tell me where Mason is!
It's not the door, Mason. It's you.
Just because you work all night, Mason, doesn't mean that I--
- Mr. Mason, don't you think you'd better hear the rest of my story?
All I've accomplished so far, Mr. Mason, is to make matters worse.
Mr. Mason, that's why I asked you to come up here.
Incidentally, that Mason is a real swell agent.
